notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, M.B. and L.D.M. Methodology, N.B., V.I. and G.C. Validation, M.B., S.R. and L.D.M. Formal analysis, N.B. and G.C. Investigation, N.B., G.C. and S.R. Resources, M.B. Writing—original draft preparation, N.B., S.R. and V.I. Writing—review and editing, M.B., L.D.M. and S.R. Funding acquisition, M.B. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
